price: 76. Mais quand Il les eut comblés de Ses grâces, ils en furent avares et se rétractèrent en se détournant.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
